main.java.ch.hszt.hs_2010.mdp.HGHM.Controller
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  main.java.ch.hszt.hs_2010.mdp.HGHM.Controller.AbstractController
      main.java.ch.hszt.hs_2010.mdp.HGHM.Controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Controller
extends AbstractController

This controller implements the required methods and provides the properties necessary to work with the DisplayViewPanel and PropertyViewPanel views. Each of methods in this class can be called upon by the views to update to state of the registered models.

Author:
david
